summary: No overlaps or contradictions were found between the provided regulatory text segments. The source text specifies information and evidence required for loan origination and monitoring, particularly for project finance and off-balance-sheet obligations, for institutions (lenders). The related content snippets address different regulatory subjects, such as NSFR calculation for off-balance sheet items, stress testing methodologies, regulatory reporting of off-balance sheet exposures, or broader economic policy recommendations, which do not align with the specific requirements for loan origination and monitoring of project finance as detailed in the source.
